subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon, a four-time series champion who failed to make the field for the Chase for the Nextel Cup last year, needed a good finish in the Sharpie 500 Saturday night at Bristol.
snippet: Jeff Gordon, a four-time series champion who failed to make the field for the Chase for the Nextel Cup last year, needed a good finish in the Sharpie 500 Saturday night at Bristol.
